H0.text: Which sub-region of Aquitaine in SW France gives its name to a type of brandy. Gascony

H2.text: Which sub-region of Aquitaine in SW France gives its name to a type of brandy. Quercy

H3.text: Which sub-region of Aquitaine in SW France gives its name to a type of brandy. Armagnac

A4.text: Armagnac is a brandy produced in the Armagnac region in Gascony, southwest France.
